title: Running the new client on a Macbook Pro
body: I have been trying to get int a game for two days now and everytime in champ select for ranked/solo summoners rift, the champ select /banning page stops working and don't display properly to the extent that I can not lock my champion in and get banned for 5 minutes. Its doing this every time now, I have just switched to low spec mode and running a repair cycle. Let me know if there is anything else that can be done with this please

replies.body: It sounds like your client is lagging behind everyone else in the lobby just enough to where you're missing those timers and then looking like you're AFK. Let's see if we can get your connection synced up a little better with everyone else by going through [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac).
I made a post similar to yours a day ago. Having the same problem and riot has not responded to me yet!
